NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Arts and Admin or the cell corresponding to Economics and Staff?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Economics} and {Staff} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to History and Faculty or the cell corresponding to History and Staff?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Computer Science and Postdoc or the cell corresponding to History and Postdoc?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Computer Science} and {Postdoc} has a higher heat value.
